urls.description: The expression “it’s not what you say, it’s what you do” is never more true than during job interviews. Your body language can have a significant impact on how you’re perceived, and so you have to be aware of it from the moment you step through the door. That’s right, you’re being judged even before you’ve uttered your first word.

urls.title: Interview body language | Totaljobs
urls.description: The expression “it’s not what you say, it’s what you do” is never more true than during job interviews. Your body language can have a significant impact on how you’re perceived, and so you have to be aware of it from the moment you step through the door. That’s right, you’re being judged even before you’ve uttered your first word.

text:
Morning Kent

How is your body language? 
Constant smiler, face toucher?

Most communication is nonverbal and your facial expressions can say a lot about you.

Read up on these body language tips from @TotaljobsUK before your next interview https://t.co/f48Zyhbvkf

#InterviewTips https://t.co/LC5EM6z41t

urls.title: Interview body language | Totaljobs
urls.description: The expression “it’s not what you say, it’s what you do” is never more true than during job interviews. Your body language can have a significant impact on how you’re perceived, and so you have to be aware of it from the moment you step through the door. That’s right, you’re being judged even before you’ve uttered your first word.
